title: Ep. 111: Beware of Storing Stuff
description:
Beware of "storage," a hack about flipping a coin, and more on the constant challenge of email. Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/111; 774-277-9336. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
